statements: SELECT * FROM patients_health_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients_health_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients_health_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients_health_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT JSON_VALUE(health_data, '$.blood_pressure') AS blood_pressure, data_timestamp FROM patients_health_data;
SELECT * FROM patients_health_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients_health_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients_health_data WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients_health_data WHERE health_data->'$.blood_pressure' > 120;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients_health_data;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthData WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM HealthData GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY max_heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM HealthData JOIN Patients ON HealthData.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM HealthData WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, last_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, health_records.heart_rate, health_records.temperature FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Male' AND health_records.temperature > 98.6;

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, sensor_data.data_value, sensor_data.timestamp FROM patients JOIN sensor_data ON patients.patient_id = sensor_data.patient_id WHERE sensor_data.sensor_type = 'Heart Rate' ORDER BY sensor_data.timestamp DESC;

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, health_records.date_recorded FROM patients LEFT JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE health_records.date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, bpm FROM heart_rate ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, systolic, diastolic FROM blood_pressure WHERE systolic > 120 AND diastolic < 80;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, celsius FROM temperature ORDER BY celsius DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patients.name, heart_rate.bpm FROM patients JOIN heart_rate ON patients.patient_id = heart_rate.patient_id WHERE heart_rate.bpm > 80 ORDER BY patients.name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patients;

SELECT patients.name, blood_pressure.systolic, blood_pressure.diastolic FROM patients JOIN blood_pressure ON patients.patient_id = blood_pressure.patient_id WHERE blood_pressure.systolic > 120 AND blood_pressure.diastolic > 80 ORDER BY patients.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, condition FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Heart Monitor';
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, value, unit FROM Readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT d.device_id, p.name, d.device_type FROM Devices d JOIN Patients p ON d.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT d.device_id, p.name, r.timestamp, r.value FROM Devices d INNER JOIN Patients p ON d.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN Readings r ON d.device_id = r.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'Blood Pressure Monitor' ORDER BY r.timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM Readings GROUP BY device_id HAVING MAX(value) - MIN(value) > 10

SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_status, a.description, r.timestamp FROM Alerts a INNER JOIN Readings r ON a.reading_id = r.reading_id WHERE a.alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY r.timestamp DESC
SELECT d.device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM Devices d INNER JOIN Readings r ON d.device_id = r.device_id GROUP BY d.device_id HAVING num_readings > 100
